name: market_get_movers
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bb_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query for all information about finance summary, stocks, quotes, movers, etcâ€¦ to create a financial site/application such as bloomberg.com
API description: Fetch the latest information on market movers based on a specified template.

is_id.description: The ID value returned from the market auto-complete endpoint, used to specify the market segment.

template.description: A string representing the category of market movers to retrieve. Possible values are 'COMMODITY', 'CURRENCY', 'INDEX', 'INDEXFUTURE', 'RATE', or 'STOCK'. Defaults to 'INDEX'.
